Subject: A new Autobot on the block!
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Skyburst::

A small torpedo tube comes through the transwarp portal, and crashes on
Earth. It opens as a bot steps out. He is a camo painted helicoptor,
wearing the Autobot logo. He had just come back online after being
deactivated by Decepticons, not to long ago. He had learned that
hundreds of years had passed. He found out about the Neo Beast Wars, and
had reconfigured himself to fit the modern day transformer.(The G1 to BW
size problem, activation code, etc.) He set his communication system to
record.
"To any Maximal or possibly Autobot forces in the neo Beast Wars, this
is the Autobot Skyburst. If you read me please make contact. I wish to
join a Maximal or Autobot faction."
He set the message to play looped on incoded Maximal and Autobot
channels. He waited.

OOC: I would prefer him to join an Autobot group. Anyway he looks like
the Sandstorm Machine Wars toy.
